column5: Snuck out for another day of laker fishing before the wind, I dont know if I'll trust that ice for a while now.  Bite was very slow, but I had about an hour that they were on fire and I went 4/8.  No big ones, but got some decent quality.  Fish mixed on tubes and x-zone swammers. Kept a couple for the smoker, cant wait for that candy!!! As usual, any questions, ask away...    http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tXmHRYXY47w
Very nice Steve , That ice looks a little sketch to me ! Are you still using the pearl coloured swammers or having better luck with another colour ?
